attributes.action: Launch Article 50 as soon as possible to start our 2 yr process to leave the EU.
attributes.background: Before the EU referendum the leaders of the other 27 countries of the EU urged us to vote remain.  Now that the UK as voted to leave, the EU are now saying that we should launch Article 50 as soon as possible.  I suggest that David Cameron launch Article 50 asap rather than wait till we get a new PM
